desc: Timeless and elegant crystal jewellery designed to inspire women to reconnect with their inner power and their truest selves. Made of natural gemstones and 14k gold-filled or 925 sterling silver metals. Handmade with love in Sydney, Australia. FREE SHIPPING within Australia. Accepts AfterPay, Klarna, and PayPal Payin4.

layout.text: Australian handmade beaded gemstone jewellery that brings confidence to every moment.
